version_description: - Changed texts and added a disclaimer

- Optimized Options screen
- Added No Ads Option
- Fixed a few connection bugs
- Changed a few layouts
And alot more

- Fixed connection issues
- Fixed reconnection issues
- Fixed bugs when connecting to unsupported devices
- The app now supports the latest firmware version

- Fixed reconnection bug
- Connection is now faster
- Audio crash fixed

- Fixed connection bugs
- Fixed iOS 13.x minor bugs

- Added an option to click on the joysticks
- Fixed a crash when the app goes to the background
